ygData.subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: i wasn t sure at the time whether you were firing an EMP cannon or an EMP grenade. =) ... He hears something being said below, but he ignores it. Haha,

OOC: i wasn't sure at the time whether you were firing an EMP 
cannon or an EMP grenade. =)

::Divebomb::
He hears something being said below, but he ignores it. "Haha, 
just die slag pile!" He fires four particle blasts at Khonkolor


On 4 Apr 2001, at 0:33, airly2000@... wrote:

> ooc: I _SHOULD_ read character'sprofile before attack... why always I 
> forget that?, about Emp yes is a granade with high power.. until I 
> know,...
> 
> Khonkolor jumped from sid to side avoiding the shots "Come one, 
> birdie, why don't you land and fight here?" said Khonkolor "Are you 
> afraid play with a cat???? or are you a sort of hen???"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: is this an EMP grenade? (Also, Divebomb had been flying 
> > straight up for two and a half posts. He's pretty high, i'd be 
> > surprised with Khonkolor could see him.)
> > 
> > ::Divebomb::
> > He watches the EMP coming up, and dodges it quite easily, 
> > blasting away with his rocket boosters. He returns fire (at 
> > Khonkolor) with three particle rifle blasts, his eagle eyes keeping 
> > track of the bot easily.  
> > 
> > 
> > On 4 Apr 2001, at 0:08, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > 
> > > Khonkolor::
> > > 
> > > Khonkolor avoided the shots and threw a EMP against Divebomb
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > ::Divebomb::
> > > > Divebomb swerves, spining rapidly, avoiding some fire, and 
> > > > deflecting other parts of, but some fire hits his armour, and 
> he is 
> > > > annoyed because of it. He turns around, he eagle eye sight 
> > > > spotting Khonkolor. "Mwhahaha," He fires three particle blasts 
> at 
> > > > Khonkolor.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > On 3 Apr 2001, at 0:09, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > > Khonkolor::
> > > > > 
> > > > > The young loin mountain shot 25 times against  Divebomb
> > > > >   ----- Original Message ----- 
> > > > >   From: rAuq 
> > > > >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
> > > > >   Sent: Monday, April 02, 2001 10:51 PM
> > > > >   Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > >   OOC: is the Element firing four EMP blasts, one missile, 
> and 
> > > five 
> > > > >   plasma blasts at each bot on the field?
> > > > > 
> > > > >   ::Razorclaw/Divebomb/Rampage::
> > > > >   Razorclaw destroys the missiles being guided at 
> Rippersnapper 
> > > > >   with his lightning gun in between dodging blasts, though a 
> > > couple 
> > > > >   are absorbed into his armour. He follows up by sending 
> three 
> > > more 
> > > > >   lightning blasts at Mantle.
> > > > > 
> > > > >   Divebomb transforms, using his heightened agility to dodge 
> > > straight 
> > > > >   up many of the shots heading at him. Two of the shots smash 
> > > into 
> > > > >   his metallic wings, leaving charred marks, and almost 
> knocking 
> > > > >   him from the sky. His rocket boosters send him straight up 
> at 
> > > an 
> > > > >   increasing speed, away from the near battle.
> > > > > 
> > > > >   Rampage is so angry; consequently, he has lost "it". As one 
> of 
> > > the 
> > > > >   laser blasts hits him, he dives to the ground, dodging the 
> > > missiles 
> > > > >   and the rest of the shots. He transforms into tiger mode as 
> he 
> > > hits 
> > > > >   the ground. Immediately, he begins firing as much as he 
> can, 
> > > > >   pumping out continues rounds from his four leg mounted 
> machine 
> > > > >   guns at Astral, and the bots around him.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > >   On 2 Apr 2001, at 19:44, Jen D. wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > >   > (ooc: I'm not good at battles, so sorry if this is 
> > > confusing :)
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > Cyndro's scanners detected weaponfire outside the 
> Element, 
> > > and quickly made 
> > > > >   > a scan to find out who the attackers were. Soon he knew 
> the 
> > > location and 
> > > > >   > weaponry of every Decepticon in the area.
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > "You might wanna go out there and fight them, Rubble, 
> we're 
> > > under attack." 
> > > > >   > he says through a speaker to Rubble, who thanks him and 
> runs 
> > > out of the 
> > > > >   > base. Cyndro reroutes more power to the shields, and then 
> > > activates the 
> > > > >   > defences.
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > The round plate on top of the Element flashed several 
> times, 
> > > and then a 
> > > > >   > deafening screech was emmited over all comm frequencees 
> other 
> > > than the ones 
> > > > >   > that the Maximals were using. After a few seconds, the 
> > > screech shut off, and 
> > > > >   > a jamming signal was sent out to disable any 
> communications 
> > > that the enemies 
> > > > >   > might have. During the screech, most of the weapons on 
> the 
> > > Element fired at 
> > > > >   > the hopefully distracted bots, sending four EMP blasts, 
> one 
> > > missile, and 
> > > > >   > five plasma shots at each one, other than the ones that 
> were 
> > > shielded by the 
> > > > >   > Cybertronian Fire (I think FireBlade is the only one 
> > > shielded :).
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > Mantle spun around when all the enemies arrived, and was 
> > > immediately ready 
> > > > >   > for battle. He flew into the air and stretched out both 
> arms. 
> > > A missile flew 
> > > > >   > out of each arm, both of them mentally guided by Mantle 
> to 
> > > hit 
> > > > >   > Rippersnapper. Out of the corner of his eyes, Mantle 
> could 
> > > see Aqua firing 
> > > > >   > his spear gun at Flesh Ripper, the same bot that he had 
> tried 
> > > to get during 
> > > > >   > the last battle. Near him, Cinder was already firing at 
> > > Rippersnapper. 
> > > > >   > Mantle knew that Cinder wanted to impress Prowl, but he 
> hoped 
> > > that she 
> > > > >   > wouldn't do stupid things to show off.
> > > > >   > 
> > > > >   > "Allright, guys, we'll fight like this for a while, and 
> then 
> > > we'll form 
> > > > >   > Element and chase these guys out of here!" he said to his 
> > > team over the 
> > > > >   > commlink, watching Rubble emerge from the Element with 
> his 
> > > missile launcher 
> > > > >   > and fire two missiles at Rampage. Mist flew by above him, 
> > > firing three 
> > > > >   > charges down at Autofire.
> > > > >   >
